entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:36 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
